nodes.text: Pantoran-style hanging gardens were a type of garden associated with the Pantoran species, who were known for their typically ostentatious style. The luxury cruiser Steady Wing had Pantoran-style hanging gardens on its third deck, which Jedi Master Douglas Sunvale suggested that a Dalnan diplomatic party he was travelling with would have time to see due to the ongoing Emergences of the Great Hyperspace Disaster extending the starship's travel time to the Starlight Beacon by a day. However, the Steady Wing and its onboard gardens were destroyed not long into its journey as a result of Nihil sabotage.
